111.content:
Zelda was lying on her bed, very bored by the lack of action after Ganondorf's defeat. Suddenly, someone knocked at the door.

"You may enter!"

Link, clad in his usual green outfit, entered in the room. He was holding a strange object in his hand.

"Hey Zelda, I found this strange ocarina near my house!"

"Wow, have you an idea what it does?"

"No, but let's give it a try!"

"Okay!"

Little did Zelda know that it was an Ocarina of Fat, able to disturb her perfect figure.

As Link played, Zelda...
111.title: weight gain

1111.content:
Like bread in a oven, Zelda's former trim stomach rose as layers of fat started to cover it. It became a jelly potbelly with a deeper navel. With that, all her toned flesh turned flabby. With her dress on, the difference didn't show much, except for her belly, wich tested her dress's limit. Her beefy arms were trying a bit to escape from her too small sleeves and a hint of soft cleavage was displayed. Puffy cheeks and a less defined jaw line were completing the picture.

"Well, this ocarina doesn't seem to have any power", Zelda said when Link stoped playing.

However, Link did notice the difference : his love interest turned from a sexy vixen to a cute chubby chick right before his eyes! Yet, he couldn't say that she turned fat because he knew too much about the women's nature.

"I have to get ready for the great ball tonight, Father wants to present me some princes so I will finally marry, will you play to me while I get dressed?"

Link accepted because...

1141.content: How will zelda be inflated?

choices: Start inflating the rst of her
11411.content:
Zelda awoke strapped to a slab of stone, and aside from from that, the room was empty. The last thing she remembered was walking through the recently rebuilt castle, when something hard hit her head, and then she woke up here.

"Ah, you're awake, Princess." Said a voice from somewhere in the room.

"Whose there? Show yourself!" Zelda demanded. A man appeared in front of here in a wisp of smoke. "Who are you?"

The man wore a black cloak, the hood covering his face. "My name is Katch." The man said. "I was Ganon's Assistant."

"Ganon had an assistant?"

"Yes." Katch said. "Before the Dark Lord's demise, he told me to make those who will cause his destruction, starting with you, to suffer."

"But why now? It's been two years since Ganon fell!" Zelda said.

"I had to hide, to make sure no one would recognize me." Katch said. "But know, it is time to begin your... punishment."

"What are you going to do? Shock me?" Zelda asked.

"No." Katch said. "Something quite different, actually." He raised his hand towards Zelda, and it started to glow green. Soon after, She began to feel a pressure building in her stomach. She looked down at it to see that her stomach was growing. She looked five months pregnant already, and was still growing.

"What's going on!?" Zelda exclaimed, as her belly looked as if she was one month overdue with eight kids. "Please stop!" As if by magic, she stopped growing. "Why are you doing this to me?!"

"It wasn't my idea. Ganon had a thing for this." Katch said. "He planned to do this to you, but that Link got in the way."

"Thank goodness..." Zelda said to herself.

"Now, the question is do I keep inflating your stomach?" Katch said. "Or do I inflate the rest of you? Make you a big, round ball..."
11411.title: Ganon's Assistant

choices: Put her inflated body out for anyone to see
Put a spell on her that allows her to inflate a whole lot more
114112.content:
"How about you deflate me and let me go?" Zelda asked. "I'll never speak of this again!"

Katch chuckled. "No, I think I'll start blowing up the rest of you," He held up his hand, "make you a big, round ball."

"Please, no!" Zelda yelled as her legs, arms, butt, and breasts started to swell up. After about 5 minutes, Zelda's whole body had gone from a extremely pregnant girl, to an 8-foot ball. All that was left of her body that hadn't inflated were her hands and feet. Her cheeks had blown up up a little bit, making her look fat. "Ooohhhh... I can't take much more..." Zelda said through her swollen face.

"Probably not..." Katch said. " I'd rather not make you pop... not messy. The question now is what do to you next?"
114112.title: Big round ball

1141122.content:
"Ooh! I know!" Katch said. He pulled out an old looking book from his cloak and began flipping through the pages. Zelda heard him flipping through it, but due to the massive orb she called her body, she could barely see his head. "Ah, here it is. The un-breakable spell..." He pointed his hand at Zelda and muttered a few words. Zelda felt a swierd tingle go up her body. She tried to see if she was inflating again, but from what she could tell; she wasn't.

"What did you do?" Zelda muffled.

"The un-breakable spell prevents the skin of whoever it's directed at un-breakable." Katch explained.

"Why?" Zelda asked.

"It means you can be inflated to huge proprtions without popping," Katch said. "That means can make you the biggest girl in all of Hyrule!"

"What!? No!" Zelda yelled. "I'm already. big enough! I don't need to get bigger!" She felt the stone slab beneath her lower down to the ground. Katch slowly rolled her so she was level with his face. He pulled his hood down, revealing a young face with a large scar across his face.

"My dear princess, you aren't nearly big neough." A creepy smirk came across his face.

"Not again." Zelda sighed as the young wizzard's hand began to glow, and her body started inflating again, but not as fast. "Please, just deflate me..."

"Not for sometime, Princess." Just has he finished, Zelda stopped growing. At this point, she was about 20 feet wide. "But let me ask you something."

"What?"

"How big shall I make you?"
1141122.title: Biggest Girl in Hyrule

1211.content: Princess Ruto was happy to finally be able to relax. Zora's domain was unfrozen and Ganondorf was defeated by Link. She felt like she deserved a rest for all her hard work as the sage of water, so she decided to not go adventuring too much for today as she usually did. As she wandered around Zora's Domain a bit, she heard a low growl. She looked around, expecting some sort of monster, but was both relieved and embarrassed to find that it was just her stomach. 'Hm, now that I think about it, I haven't eaten much since I became a sage, have I?' She thought to herself. She spoke to one of the Zora and told him to bring her the finest fish in the domain. Ruto felt that she could have an entire feast herself. She would've probably considered eating Lord Jabujabu, if he were still there. She also remembered Link asking if she could plump herself up a bit. While she hadn't thought much of it before, she realized that Link liking bigger women would make sense. She decided she MUST get bigger now, for more than just her hunger. She sat on top of the waterfall "throne" near her father as she waited for what seemed like forever. She kept waiting until...

I haven't seen him in a while" thought Ruto; it was true, Link hasn't come to Zora's domain in months. It was a golden necklace with a strange glowing stone. "Wow" was all Ruto could say while she held the necklace with her hands. "Where it came from, how did it get here? Well it doesn't matter; it's mine now!" said princess Ruto as she puts on the necklace. 13122.content:
Malon sat in the stables of her barn singing to the barn animals as she always did. She would normally do this for fun and to keep them happy, though lately she's been trying to take her mind off of eating. She had always eaten chicken, cheese, or some kind of vegetable and she wished there was something more. She had avoided eating these foods too much as she had gotten sick of it. This resulted in her getting incredibly hungry for anything new at all. Her father had thought that he could get a new type of meat from the cows, but Malon refused to let him slaughter them as she loved them way too much. Speaking of which, the next animals to sing to were the cows. Malon sung to them while staring directly at their plump bodies. She began to feel strange as she stared, and something snapped in her brain. Malon's mouth began to water as she thought of what they may taste like, something she had never done before. She decided to turn in early to stop these thoughts, as the cows gave her worried looks, but had dreams of their possible flavors anyway because she couldn't help herself.

info.brief_description: The girls of ocarina of time grow big.
info.description:
The girls from the game of "the legend of Zelda: ocarina of time" have all sorts of expansions.

Thing allowed: weight gain, breast, butt, and belly expansion, inflation, and vore.

Thing NOT allowed: exploding, killing characters, male growth (this is female growth only), and no swearing
Only use ocarina of time characters.
The story must begin AFTER Link defeated Ganondorf, so Ganondorf can not be in any of the chapters (he can appear in flash backs only)
Other than that anything goes.
Enjoy!
Please add!
info.pretty_title: The Legend Of Zelda: Ocarina of Fat
